TheLibrarian:Curiosity.NAME: Curiosity
TheLibrarian:Curiosity.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand, NL then draw cards equal to your thelibrarian:Anthology.

TheLibrarian:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
TheLibrarian:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

TheLibrarian:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
TheLibrarian:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
TheLibrarian:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

TheLibrarian:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
TheLibrarian:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

TheLibrarian:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
TheLibrarian:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !TheLibrarian:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

TheLibrarian:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
TheLibrarian:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !TheLibrarian:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

TheLibrarian:SkimCollection.NAME: Skim Collection
TheLibrarian:SkimCollection.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Anthology:Costs [E] less.
TheLibrarian:SkimCollection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your draw pile into your hand. NL Anthology:Costs [E] less.

TheLibrarian:EmptyBook.NAME: Empty Book
TheLibrarian:EmptyBook.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.NL If Fatal, gain an additional card reward at the end of combat.

TheLibrarian:HeartOfAspiration.NAME: Heart Of Aspiration
TheLibrarian:HeartOfAspiration.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL This is a placeholder effect.

TheLibrarian:FariesCare.NAME: Fairies' Care
TheLibrarian:FariesCare.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 plus Anthology Regen. NL This is a placeholder effect.

TheLibrarian:OpenedCanofWellCheers.NAME: Opened Can of WellCheers
TheLibrarian:OpenedCanofWellCheers.DESCRIPTION: Get a potion. Exhaust. NL Anthology: Get an additional choice of potion.

TheLibrarian:BarrierOfVines.NAME: Barrier of Vines
TheLibrarian:BarrierOfVines.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to All enemies.

TheLibrarian:DreamOfABlackSwan.NAME: Dream of a Black Swan
TheLibrarian:DreamOfABlackSwan.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength, Dexterity, and Metallicize. Shuffle 6 Brothers into your Discard.

TheLibrarian:DOBSHardyBrother.NAME: A Hardy Brother
TheLibrarian:DOBSHardyBrother.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Metallicize. NL Draw a Card. NL Exhaust.

TheLibrarian:DOBSQuickBrother.NAME: A Quick Brother
TheLibrarian:DOBSQuickBrother.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Dexterity. NL Draw a Card. NL Exhaust.

TheLibrarian:DOBSStrongBrother.NAME: A Strong Brother
TheLibrarian:DOBSStrongBrother.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Strength. NL Draw a Card. NL Exhaust.

TheLibrarian:Penitence.NAME: Penitence
TheLibrarian:Penitence.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a Status or Curse card, gain !M! block.
